stripped_text: Persistent -> The Runner cannot steal agendas from this server or its root. Ignore this ability for any agenda the Runner has a copy of in their score area. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.) Limit 1 region per server.
